data.oai_dc:dc: Elucidating the evolutionary history of the Southeast Asian, holoparasitic, giant-flowered Rafflesiaceae: Pliocene vicariance, morphological convergence and character displacement

Elucidating the evolutionary history of the Southeast Asian, holoparasitic, giant-flowered Rafflesiaceae: Pliocene vicariance, morphological convergence and character displacement Parsimony, Bayesian and maximum likelihood phylogenetic analyses were performed on this dataset in addition to bayesian divergence times estimates using BEAST.

BEAST|Bayesian inference|biogeographic history|character displacement|DIVA|homoplasy|LAGRANGE C++|phylogeny|Rafflesiaceae|Rafflesia|Rhizanthes|Sapria|Southeast Asia|Sundaland|Philippines|atp6|matR|nad1 B-C intron|ITS|16S.
